verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֡ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man אֱמֹר֩ <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor say לִנְגִ֨יד <S%H5057><s%> lin-Gid unto the prince צֹ֜ר <S%H6865><s%> tzor of Tyrus כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because גָּבַ֤הּ <S%H1361><s%> ga-Vah [is] lifted up לִבְּךָ֙ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Cha Because thine heart וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer and thou hast said אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> 'el I [am] a God אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, in מוֹשַׁ֧ב <S%H4186><s%> mo-Shav [in] the seat אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God יָשַׁ֖בְתִּי <S%H3427><s%> ya-Shav-ti I sit בְּלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> be-Lev in the midst יַמִּ֑ים <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim; of the seas וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam yet thou [art] a man וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and not אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> 'El, and not God וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> vat-tit-Ten though thou set לִבְּךָ֖ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Cha thine heart כְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> ke-Lev as the heart אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. of God

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold חָכָ֛ם <S%H2450><s%> cha-Cham Behold thou [art] wiser אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you; מִדָּנִאֵל mid-da-ni-'el כמִדָּֽנִיאֵ֑ל <S%H1840><s%> mid-da-ni-'El; Daniel קכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner סָת֖וּם <S%H5640><s%> sa-Tum there is no secret לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo is a עֲמָמֽוּךָ׃ <S%H6004><s%> 'a-ma-Mu-cha. that they can hide

בְּחָכְמָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H2451><s%> be-cha-che-ma-te-Cha With thy wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H8394><s%> u-vit-vu-Na-te-cha, and with thine understanding עָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta thou hast gotten לְּךָ֖ le-Cha חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil; thee riches וַתַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vat-Ta-'as and hast gotten זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> va-Che-sef and silver בְּאוֹצְרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H214><s%> be-'otz-ro-Tei-cha. into thy treasures

בְּרֹ֧ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro By thy great חָכְמָתְךָ֛ <S%H2451><s%> cha-che-ma-te-Cha wisdom בִּרְכֻלָּתְךָ֖ <S%H7404><s%> bir-chul-la-te-Cha [and] by thy traffick הִרְבִּ֣יתָ <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bi-ta hast thou increased חֵילֶ֑ךָ <S%H2428><s%> chei-Le-cha; thy riches וַיִּגְבַּ֥הּ <S%H1361><s%> vai-yig-Bah is lifted up לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha and thine heart בְּחֵילֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2428><s%> be-chei-Le-cha. because of thy riches ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֕ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD יַ֛עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because תִּתְּךָ֥ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Cha Because thou hast set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha as the heart כְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> ke-Lev thine heart אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. of God

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi Behold therefore I will bring עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha Against זָרִ֔ים <S%H2114><s%> za-Rim, strangers עָרִיצֵ֖י <S%H6184><s%> 'a-ri-Tzei upon thee the terrible גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim; of the nations וְהֵרִ֤יקוּ <S%H7324><s%> ve-he-Ri-ku and they shall draw חַרְבוֹתָם֙ <S%H2719><s%> char-vo-Tam their swords עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- Against יְפִ֣י <S%H3308><s%> ye-Fi against the beauty חָכְמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H2451><s%> cha-che-ma-Te-cha, of thy wisdom וְחִלְּל֖וּ <S%H2490><s%> ve-chil-le-Lu and they shall defile יִפְעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3314><s%> yif-'a-Te-cha. thy brightness

לַשַּׁ֖חַת <S%H7845><s%> lash-Sha-chat to the pit יֽוֹרִד֑וּךָ <S%H3381><s%> yo-ri-Du-cha; They shall bring thee down וָמַ֛תָּה <S%H4463><s%> va-Mat-tah the deaths מְמוֹתֵ֥י <S%H4191><s%> me-mo-Tei and thou shalt die חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> cha-Lal of [them that are] slain בְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> be-Lev in the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim. of the seas

הֶאָמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> he-'a-Mor Wilt thou yet תֹּאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> to-Mar say אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him god אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, in לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הֹֽרְגֶ֑ךָ <S%H2026><s%> ho-re-Ge-cha; him that slayeth וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam man וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and not אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> 'el and no God בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad in the hand מְחַלְלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H2490><s%> me-chal-Lei-cha. of him that slayeth

מוֹתֵ֧י <S%H4194><s%> mo-Tei the deaths עֲרֵלִ֛ים <S%H6189><s%> 'a-re-Lim of the uncircumcised תָּמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mut Thou shalt die בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by the hand זָרִ֑ים <S%H2114><s%> za-Rim; of strangers כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti, for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בְּעֵ֨דֶן <S%H5731><s%> be-'E-den Thou hast been in Eden גַּן־ <S%H1588><s%> gan- the garden אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God הָיִ֗יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ta, become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Every אֶ֨בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven stone יְקָרָ֤ה <S%H3368><s%> ye-ka-Rah every precious מְסֻכָתֶ֙ךָ֙ <S%H4540><s%> me-su-cha-Te-cha [was] thy covering אֹ֣דֶם <S%H124><s%> 'O-dem the sardius פִּטְדָ֞ה <S%H6357><s%> pit-Dah topaz וְיָהֲלֹ֗ם <S%H3095><s%> ve-ya-ha-Lom, and the diamond תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> tar-Shish the beryl שֹׁ֙הַם֙ <S%H7718><s%> sho-ham the onyx וְיָ֣שְׁפֵ֔ה <S%H3471><s%> ve-Ya-she-Peh, and the jasper סַפִּ֣יר <S%H5601><s%> sap-Pir the sapphire נֹ֔פֶךְ <S%H5306><s%> No-fech, the emerald וּבָרְקַ֖ת <S%H1304><s%> u-va-re-Kat and the carbuncle וְזָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav; and gold מְלֶ֨אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet the workmanship תֻּפֶּ֤יךָ <S%H8596><s%> tup-Pei-cha of thy tabrets וּנְקָבֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5345><s%> u-ne-ka-Vei-cha and of thy pipes בָּ֔ךְ <S%H99999><s%> Bach, בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in thee in the day הִבָּרַאֲךָ֖ <S%H1254><s%> hib-ba-ra-'a-Cha that thou wast created כּוֹנָֽנוּ׃ <S%H3559><s%> ko-Na-nu. was prepared

תָּמִ֤ים <S%H8549><s%> ta-Mim Thou [wast] perfect אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah in בִּדְרָכֶ֔יךָ <S%H1870><s%> bid-ra-Chei-cha, in thy ways מִיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> mi-Yom from the day הִבָּֽרְאָ֑ךְ <S%H1254><s%> hib-ba-re-'Ach; that thou wast created עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- Until נִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> nim-Tza was found עַוְלָ֖תָה <S%H5766><s%> 'av-La-tah till iniquity בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.

בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro By the multitude רְכֻלָּתְךָ֗ <S%H7404><s%> re-chul-la-te-Cha, of thy merchandise מָל֧וּ <S%H4390><s%> ma-Lu they have filled תוֹכְךָ֛ <S%H8432><s%> toch-Cha the midst חָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas of thee with violence וַֽתֶּחֱטָ֑א <S%H2398><s%> vat-te-che-Ta; and thou hast sinned וָאֶחַלֶּלְךָ֩ <S%H2490><s%> va-'e-chal-lel-Cha therefore I will cast thee as profane מֵהַ֨ר <S%H2022><s%> me-Har out of the mountain אֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God וָֽאַבֶּדְךָ֙ <S%H6><s%> va-'ab-bed-Cha and I will destroy כְּר֣וּב <S%H3742><s%> ke-Ruv cherub הַסֹּכֵ֔ךְ <S%H5526><s%> has-so-Chech, thee O covering מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch from the midst אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> 'av-nei- of the stones אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh. of fire

גָּבַ֤הּ <S%H1361><s%> ga-Vah was lifted up לִבְּךָ֙ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Cha Thine heart בְּיָפְיֶ֔ךָ <S%H3308><s%> be-ya-fe-Ye-cha, because of thy beauty שִׁחַ֥תָּ <S%H7843><s%> shi-Cha-ta thou hast corrupted חָכְמָתְךָ֖ <S%H2451><s%> cha-che-ma-te-Cha thy wisdom עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by reason of יִפְעָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H3314><s%> yif-'a-Te-cha; thy brightness עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- reason אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz thee to the ground הִשְׁלַכְתִּ֗יךָ <S%H7993><s%> hish-lach-Ti-cha, I will cast לִפְנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei thee before מְלָכִ֛ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim kings נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Ti-cha I will lay לְרַ֥אֲוָה <S%H7200><s%> le-Ra-'a-vah that they may behold בָֽךְ׃ <S%H99999><s%> Vach.

מֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> me-Ro by the multitude עֲוֹנֶ֗יךָ <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nei-cha, of thine iniquities בְּעֶ֙וֶל֙ <S%H5766><s%> be-'E-vel by the iniquity רְכֻלָּ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H7404><s%> re-chul-La-te-cha, of thy traffick חִלַּ֖לְתָּ <S%H2490><s%> chil-Lal-ta Thou hast defiled מִקְדָּשֶׁ֑יךָ <S%H4720><s%> mik-da-Shei-cha; thy sanctuaries וָֽאוֹצִא־ <S%H3318><s%> va-'o-tzi- therefore will I bring forth אֵ֤שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh a fire מִתּֽוֹכְךָ֙ <S%H8432><s%> mit-toch-Cha from the midst הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi It אֲכָלַ֔תְךָ <S%H398><s%> 'a-cha-Lat-cha, of thee it shall devour וָאֶתֶּנְךָ֤ <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-ten-Cha thee and I will bring לְאֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H665><s%> le-'E-fer thee to ashes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, upon the earth לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all רֹאֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Ei-cha. of all them that behold
